name: Cold Feet
desc: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point.  If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.

name: Splinter Blast
desc: Launches a ball of brittle ice toward an enemy. The ice shatters on impact, leaving the primary target completely unaffected, while hurling damaging splinters into nearby enemies in a 500 radius. Enemies struck by these splinters are slowed by 30%.

name: Exorcism
desc: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt.  Lasts 35 seconds.

name: Moonlight Shadow
desc: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.

name: Untouchable
desc: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.

name: Laguna Blade
desc: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Charge of Darkness
desc: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects.  All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash.  If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.

name: Slithereen Crush
desc: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.

name: Dream Coil
desc: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for 0.5 seconds and damaging them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Ensnare
desc: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.
